articles.title: Rugby-Pumas coach Ledesma rues handing easy points to Wallabies
articles.description: The Pumas remain without a win in the opening five matches in the competition following a 27-8 defeat at the hands of the Wallabies, and Ledesma felt Argentina gifted the Australians too many points. "The first couple of tries were pretty easy for them, they didn't have to work a lot for them," he said.
articles.content: Coach Mario Ledesma was left to regret a series of missed opportunities as Argentina slipped to another loss in The Rugby Championship against Australia in Townsville on Saturday. The Pumas remain without a win in the opening five matches in the comp... [1716 chars]

articles.title: Argentine corn planting gets fast start, more rain needed
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Sept 23 (Reuters) - Argentina 2021/22 corn planting has raced out of the blocks as farmers take advantage of good soil moisture levels, but more rain will be needed for growers to complete early season corn sowing plans, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday.Argentina is the world's second largest corn exporter and the exchange forecasts a record 55
